Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are eventually followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that lead to a successful completion (i.e., end with Payment Handled) without any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are immediately followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER versus those followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE occurring in variants where Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER appears, compared to variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are resubmitted after a Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros and result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of rework loops involving Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER over those leading to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that bypass the PRE_APPROVER role entirely
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR (skipping PRE_APPROVER), compared to those routed through PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that appear more than once in the same case due to prior rejections, including by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that are preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE per case that experiences at least one Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE associated with domestic declarations (implied by immediate Request Payment) that avoid PRE_APPROVER rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Fraction of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that never reach a PRE_APPROVER (either approved or rejected), indicating process deviation or simplification
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE per year, specifically in cases that later encounter Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in 2018 (university-wide data) that result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, compared to 2017 (two departments only)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
